tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE elevation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    elevation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE flood_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    risk_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE flood_warnings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warning_id INT,
    location TEXT,
    warning_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_areas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    risk_factor FLOAT,
    area_size FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE flood_mapping (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    elevation_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES flood_zones(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (elevation_id) REFERENCES elevation_data(id)
);
